description:
LAR4202 Arabic 6 is an upper advanced Arabic module and a continuation of LAR4201 Arabic 5. It is intended to make students proficient language users. The
students will better their speaking skill through group discussions, pair work, and oral presentations. They will listen to advanced listening comprehension materials, such as newscasts, talk shows and movies. In addition to the textbook readings, students will read stories and newspaper articles. They will learn to write
new types of essays, such as descriptive, narrative and argumentative ones, using more selective language and complex structures. Higher level word‚Äêformation
processes and sentence structures will be taught.
title: Arabic 6
prerequisite:
Cohort 2021 onwards: 
Successful completion of LAR4201 or by placement test. Student must not have read a higher level module than this module.
